Text: Is this the Directors cut or not ?
Congratulations for the green skull! It was asbout time...
I wish uploaders would put the format in their notes, it's so important these days. Is this AVI or not?!

@loosenose
It's an MKV file. If you're ever in doubt though, just click the number listed next to "Files." It will tell you everything included in the file. Not very useful when there's a bunch of .rar archives though :/
